game.name: TrollFace Quest USA 2
game.description:
Troll Face along with his funny friends have come back to America after a long time. They continue to troll their way across the USA. However, this time they need you as these funny souls seek new ways of trolling. Would you join them to make their job easier? Join TrollFace Quest USA 2 and be prepared to guide them when they want to prank everyone they encounter during their amazing journey from sea to shining sea! Do not forget to use the hints, if needed.

You have to put your brain and puzzle-solving skills to the test to solve the tricky and challenging levels to deal with. Your insane wit will help to overcome this grinning menace. Click the play button and get ready to outwit the troll and challenge him in a way like never before once again! Make sure to solve different mind-boggling situations to complete each level. Try to click on several characters or objects in a proper order to complete 17 unique and addictive levels.

Feel free to complete each level by opting for the trial and making some errors in this cool brain game! Click the hints to get some help in case of being stuck or unable to spot a solution for the puzzle! Remember but you can use these hints for a limited amount of time so use them wisely. Interact with renowned celebrities to the world popular politicians in this one of the top arcade games! Enjoy lots of comedy and humour, plenty of puzzles and immersive mechanics for free without download! Common boys! No one is going to stop you from trying out this online puzzle!
